front.title: Deterministic Usage of DSA and ECDSA Digital Signature Algorithms

abstract.t: This document defines a deterministic digital signature generationprocedure. Such signatures are compatible with standard DSA andECDSA digital signatures, and can be processed with unmodifiedverifiers, which need not be aware of the procedure describedtherein. Deterministic signatures retain the cryptographic securityfeatures associated with digital signatures, but can be more easilyimplemented in various environments since they do not need access toa source of high quality randomness.
